jump_scares.spoiler: David is knocked down by a werewolf which then begins to attack Jack
The werewolf attacks David
During a dream sequence, a naked David jumps on a deer and begins eating it
During another dream sequence, Jack suddenly opens his eyes and growls at Nurse Alex
A man opens the front door and is gunned down by some strange looking mutants
Nurse Alex opens the curtains and is attacked by a mutant
David adjusts the bathroom mirror and sees un-dead Jack in the reflection
A werewolf jumps out and attacks a young couple
The scene abruptly cuts to a telephone ringing
There is a close up of the werewolf’s face and a loud growling noise before the scene cuts to a train
The scene abruptly cuts to a lion roaring at a zoo
A man is attacked by a werewolf in the movie theater
The werewolf bursts through the door to the movie theater
The werewolf roars and is repeatedly shot
Hank jumps at Abby from the side
After Hank says “you should get that thing off him before he floats away” there is a car horn blast and a cut to Hank firing a gun
As Abby is pulling the hammock there is a cut to Hank falling out of bed
The trap Hank set suddenly goes off
As Hank’s gunshot lights up the area the monster is seen kneeling on the ground
While Hank is singing, the monster suddenly lunges at him
An alien creature screeches at Moses as he searches through the car, a couple of seconds later it leaps at his face
The alien suddenly attacks one of the policemen as he closes the van doors, a few seconds later it pounces on the other policeman
The alien appears by the door to the van
The alien lunges at the windscreen
The alien attacks Hi Hatz’ henchman as he turns around
There is a loud bang on the door
Moses looks through the peephole in the door a second time and the alien suddenly lunges at the door
The alien smashes in the recycling bin that Biggz is hiding in
The alien lunges at Biggz as he peers out of the recycling bin
The alien bangs on the lift
An alien knocks over Jerome
Jerome grabs Pest’s ankle
Bee gets scared by Greg climbing up the stairs
As Bee is looking around, David suddenly throws his body against the window behind her
After being woken up by Alice, Greg’s sudden move scares the group of girls
Sophie hugs Bee from behind
Teddy the bear pops up on the edge of the bed
The dollhouse bursts open
A silhouette of a demon appears in the hallway
Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
Zakk surprises Brodie
Rikki suddenly opens his eyes and attacks Zakk and Brodie
Terry, who is now possessed, appears beside Brodie in the bathroom
A bloodied hand bursts through Abigail’s chest
The face of Abigail, who is now possessed, pops up in front of Zakk and Brodie
Uncle Albert, who is now possessed, suddenly appears behind Brodie
An axe head hits the wall just beside Brodie
A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash
Possessed Henrietta bursts through the cellar floor
Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door
Possessed Ash appears at a window
Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
While on the Thunder Mountain rollercoaster, a man’s head hits against a ceiling, becomes decapitated, and flies at the camera
A park guest’s face shifts into a creepy smile accompanied by a sound cue as she walks past the camera
There is a sudden explosion at the Spaceship Earth attraction and it collapses
A loud slamming noise scares the boy, causing him to drop the bottle of wine
The boy stands up and gets grabbed on the head by the butcher
The butcher kicks the door open
While running through a hallway the butcher steps in front of the girl
While Millie is walking through her highschool, someone jumps at her and screams as a joke
Millie peaks out from underneath the bleachers, and the butcher jumps in front of her
Ryler rushes out of the bathroom and once she gets to the door the butcher (in Millie’s body) steps out in front of her
While Millie (in the butcher’s body) is walking through a haunted house, a toy ghost flies out at her from the side
A knife pierces through the door
Wee wakes up to a bunch of medical dolls standing in the room
The nurses tell the story of a man who died in the ER, with third degree burns. While they talk, pictures and short unsettling clips show up accompanied by loud noises
A security guard trips and falls over a metal tray cart during a tense and quiet scene
The dead man turns toward the camera and growls as Wee snaps a picture with his phone
When young Gla closes the fridge door there’s a doll sitting behind it, with sudden eerie music
Young Gla’s father suddenly appears close to the camera with a loud sound
A loud thud when Wee accidentally walks into some boxes
The wheelchair is right in front of them when they turn their camera
An echoing thud as the third wheelchair crashes into the first two
Things start falling down from the shelves and furniture moves by itself, accompanied with eerie music
A quick flashback of the first ghost encounter is shown in a way less intense moment
The laptop opens up by itself
While Wee is screaming at the ghost of Gla, the elevator shakes and the light turns off, with a loud bang
The elevator makes a loud sudden noise
The lights break as Wee removes Mai’s shirt
Wee is thrown away from Mai’s body
There’s a loud clatter as the whiteboard starts to move on its own
During a silent moment there’s a fast camera movement to suddenly show an angry Gla appearing in front of Wee, followed by a loud bang
The paper cutter is thrown against Wee
A medical doll appears behind Wee accompanied by a loud noise as its head falls off
During this scene, Wee is thrown against the wall 2 times, as well as thrown up into the air while the room spins around
Gla appears and pushes Wee
The body in the body bag next to Wee suddenly rises up
When Wee turns around to film the body of Gla, his face has turned demonic
Roses’s car runs into a deer
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina can be seen walking past the hallway in the background of the shot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris spies Georgina looking out from a window in the house
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina turns around and looks at Chris
During a tense scene, Chris closes a door to reveal Rose is watching him
After a long period of silence Chris suddenly runs at Dean and attacks him
As Chris goes to leave, Jeremy runs up and grabs him from behind
Chris drives into Georgina
The side mirror beside Chris is suddenly blown off by a gunshot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris turns to the side and sees Rose looking at him
A hooded person wearing a mask drops down behind Tree
Tree turns around and the masked killer is standing in the doorway
The masked killer can now be seen in the mirror standing behind Tree
The television turns back on as Tree approaches the shower curtain
The masked killer appears from behind Tree
The lights in the hospital turn back on and Tree’s professor (Gregory) is now standing beside Carter
Gregory opens a door, startling Tree as she tries to sneak down the hospital hallway, seconds later the masked killer appears behind Gregory
The police officer is suddenly hit by a car as he listens to his Walkie-talkie
A snake crawls out in front of Ig
The waitress looks in the rear view mirror and sees Ig
Several disturbing images flash across the screen as Terry overdoses on drugs
After a few seconds of droning sounds as the camera zooms in on the saleswoman, there is a sudden clinking noise that causes her to flinch
Lila has a vision of the leprechaun in between the seats
A truck backs into some barrels
A bloody Ozzy is standing over Lila
Matt comes around the corner
There is a stuffed panda on the bed
Andy sneaks up and grabs Katie
The leprechaun jumps out in front of the closet
A rabbit knocks into a barrel
A homeless man pops up against the window
A beaver swims past Walt
Walt suddenly surfaces in front of the boat
Kelly and Hank’s boat flips over
Hank moves a branch to reveal Hector standing behind it
The crocodile jumps out of the water and bites off a man’s head
Hank is pulled into the air by a trap
Kelly stands on a branch and a decomposing head flies out at her
The crocodile jumps up and grabs the helicopter
The crocodile surfaces beside the helicopter
The crocodile appears in front of Hank
The crocodile surfaces once more beside the helicopter
The crocodile grabs Hector
There are three quick cuts to The Reaper ferociously cutting a pot plant accompanied by heavy metal music
Towers smashes the television screen with his golf club
Odd turns around and a faceless man in a bowling shirt is in front of him. [Video]
A man gets hit by a truck suddenly
A cold force suddenly radiates out from the door
Odd’s hand is suddenly pulled into a hole in the door
A large number of bodachs suddenly appear in the room
Something bangs on the door that Stormy is standing behind
A bodach pops up in front of the camera
Odd closes the fridge door to reveal the ghost of Bob standing behind. [Video]
A masked man appears at a window
As Varner prepares to shoot Odd in the van, a bodach suddenly comes out of the window and screeches at Odd
A bloodied and mutilated hand reaches up out of the water
The dock collapses causing Sheriff Forester to fall into the water
A mutilated dead body suddenly pops up out of the water onto Sheriff Forester’s back
A fish embryo inside an egg suddenly starts moving
A Piranha suddenly bites the diver’s hand
Piranhas suddenly appear, chasing a girl in the water
The girl who was parasailing is lifted out of the water revealing her missing legs and mutilated body
A girl being carried out of the water, suddenly splits in two
A giant piranha suddenly jumps out of the water and over the boat, taking Novak with it
Ghostface appears in front of Christine
During a nightmare Sidney is having, Ghostface jumps up from behind a window and attacks her. [Video]
As a prank, Tyson scares Sarah
Sarah is startled by a Ghostface costume hanging on a rack
The bodyguard puts his hand on Gale’s shoulder
Ghostface appears behind the bodyguard
Jennifer startles Dewey and Gale, several seconds later they are startled again by Angelina and Tom
Ghostface pops out from behind a car
Jennifer yells out as Dewey and Gale go to kiss each other
A girl steps out of a caravan, startling the group
Jennifer surprises Gale
Ghostface appears at the window behind Sidney. [Video]
Ghostface opens a door inside the house
Dewey and Tyson bump into each other
Gale backs into Jennifer
Angelina bursts out of a door surprising Gale and Jennifer
Angelina turns a corner and runs into Ghostface
Ghostface suddenly appears, interrupting Dewey
Ghostface grabs Gale
Ghostface enters the room
Ghostface appears once more behind Sidney
Roman suddenly attacks Mark
Roman jumps up off the ground and runs at Sidney
A chair is thrown through the window
Casey looks in the window as a masked man turns around
Sidney peers out of the window as Billy pops up
A masked man comes out of the door behind Sidney
Billy climbs through the window
Sidney opens front door to Deputy Dewey holding the killer’s mask. [Video]
Principal Himbry closes the door revealing the masked man standing behind it
Gale turns around and almost runs into Deputy Dewey
Some tools fall down
Billy suddenly appears
The masked man grabs Sidney’s arm
Randy pops up beside Gale’s window
Kenny’s dead body slides off the roof onto the windscreen
The masked man pops up from the back-seat behind Sidney
Billy opens the door and Randy bursts in
Randy grabs Sidney while she is kneeling on the floor
Billy punches Randy
A dead looking Billy reaches out his hand suddenly
Sidney’s father falls out of the closet

movies.title: Stay Out Of The F**king Attic

jump_scares.spoiler: A hand hits the floor and a scream is heard
As they open the door a box falls down
Kyle jumps out from behind a couch to scare Lizzie
Lizzie puts her hand on Kyle’s shoulder while he is watching TV
Timothy suddenly appears in frame, chasing after Lizzie
Timothy’s hand appears in front of Mikey
A hand reaches out from underneath a car to grab a woman
A man’s face is suddenly engulfed in flames
A lady walks into another woman dressed in a Halloween costume
A lady leans back on the sofa to reveal Mary Bailey is sitting beside her
Over the next few seconds there are several sudden cuts to Bobbie (in red witch form) that may startle some viewers
Bobbie turns around to face Jack and her face morphs into the red witch
The killer bursts through the window
The previously dead girl suddenly sits up and screams
The girl bursts through the door
The “child” jumps out at one of the kidnappers
The man touches an animatronic corpse, which suddenly goes off and begins to flail around
One of the funhouse workers turns around a corner and is grabbed by the Rocco the clown
The lights go off, causing the group of girls to scream
As the camera is panning, Dr. Suave jumps out from behind a corner
Mikey and Randall approach a window and Dollface slams a girl against it from the other side
A woman runs up to the car and begins to bang on the window
A funhouse worker jumps out at Laurie and the injured man while they are walking through a hallway
Post credits scene – As the camera pans over several body bags, one of them springs up

movies.title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls

jump_scares.spoiler: A demon head pops out of the clock beside Lewis
A tentacled creature bursts out of the door behind Jonathan
During a flashback, Isaac grabs Jonathan’s throat after Jonathan checks him for a pulse
Some manure suddenly lands on Lewis
Birds fly out of the secret entrance as Jonathan crawls inside
Lewis shines his torch on a statue and Tarby suddenly shouts “BOO!”
There is a loud bang from inside the coffin
One of the toys grabs Lewis around the ankle
David attacks the security guard in the parking lot
Michael screams in horror as the brothers drop into the fog from the train bridge
The family dog attacks Michael when he enters the bathroom to kill Sam
Thor the dog lunges at Lucy
Edgar plunges a wooden spike through Marko’s heart
Paul leaps out from behind the bathroom door
Max turns around revealing he is a vampire
Grandpa drives his jeep into the house killing Max with a large wooden spike
As Leilani and Jibran argue in the car, a cyclist suddenly slams into the windshield
After the two get back into the car, a man suddenly strikes the window pane and frightens Jibran
One of the surfers shows its fangs and begins to screech
Nicole suddenly gets in front of Chris at a very fast speed and grabs him by the throat
As a camera shows an empty room through a window, Nicole appears from the side at extreme speed
While running, Evan bumps into one of the vampires
The barn door swings open
There is a sudden flash of light revealing one of the vampires reaching out to grab Evan
One of the vampires facing away from the camera quickly turns its head to reveal that it’s fully shifted into its true form
There is a sudden screech and Chris is dragged out of screen
A lightbulb suddenly explodes
Aunt Jillian suddenly swings the door open
An explosion in the sand scares rick
As Evy is searching where a sound comes from a skeleton pops up with a very loud sound effect (but it turns out to be a joke from Jonathan)
Rick throws a bag on the table scaring Evy
When Evy comes up from picking her brush, Hook from the Medjai is suddenly behind her
When Rick and the group turns around the group of Americans are pointing guns at them
A mild jump scare when Jonathan suddenly takes his hand out of his bag
When Rick and Jonathan first open Imhotep’s sarcophagus, his wet corpse pops out
When Evy reads from the book of the dead Imhotep´s corpse suddenly wakes up and lets out a roar
A shadow suddenly passes by
The ground suddenly shakes
A hand pops out of the ground
Mr. Daniels checks the window and suddenly a sandstorm blows towards him
When Rick decapitates a mummy, the mummy holds his head and Rick then slams the sword to the head causing the mummy´s head to fly towards the screen
Anck Su Namun pops up behind Rick and Evy
Evy runs into Anck Su Namuns
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
Fiona looks up and screams suddenly
During a flashback, a sock puppet briefly appears on screen accompanied by an electronic noise that may startle some viewers
Lisa backs into Jerry
A teenage boy turns around and a machete blade is driven into his head
Lowell head butts McKayla
Syl trips on a rubbish bin
After switching the lights back on, Syl turns around and a masked person is standing behind her
Syl turns and sees another masked figure in front of her
Sadie clobbers Big Al with a baseball bat as he talks to McKayla
The scene cuts away from Sadie and Jordan back to the gym (as an ominous sound effect plays)
The camera cuts back to Mrs. Kent and Lowell is now standing behind her
A personal trainer zombie attacks the glass
Body parts fall from the fire escape and land on a dumpster
A pack of zombies, led by R, bust through the pharmacy lab doors
Zombie dad makes a run and lunges at Perry before being shot dead
The skeleton eaters jump and claw at the door as R and Julie escape
M runs over three skeleton eaters with a luggage cart
Julie’s dad pulls a gun on R
A dead body/zombie jumps on Julie
A zombie lunges at the camera
A zombie attacks a man in the toilet
A zombie bursts out of a toilet door and lunges at Columbus
A zombie appears in the back seat of the car that Columbus is driving
Columbus has a vision of a clown crawling under the toilet cubicle door
Columbus wakes up on the couch and turns around to see his neighbour has turned into a zombie. [Video
The zombie neighbour reaches for the door-handle
A mechanical figure pops out at Columbus in the haunted house attraction
A zombie attacks Columbus from behind. [Video
